https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fhOJX3idPDlZ3oQSBSLKO5NHeju.jpg Ami is a 6 year old girl, extremely sensitive. Her mother, Carmen, lives with the obsession of giving a son to her husband, Gabriel. When finally she gets pregnant, the relation between mother and daughter becomes a tragic one, driving the family to an inevitable nightmare. Butterfly Wings
